# TrackLoop

The TrackLoop component loops over tracks. It is for example a easy way to loop over all participant camera and screen share tracks. TrackLoop creates a TrackContext for each track that you can use to e.g. render the track.

## Import

```typescript
import { TrackLoop } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Usage

```tsx
const tracks = useTracks([Track.Source.Camera]);
<TrackLoop tracks={tracks} >
 <TrackContext.Consumer>
   {(track) => track && <VideoTrack {...track}/>}
 </TrackContext.Consumer>
<TrackLoop />
```

{% partial file="p_usage.md" variables={exampleCount: 1} /%}

## Properties

{% parameter name="children" type="React.ReactNode" optional=false %}
The template component to be used in the loop.

{% /parameter %}

{% parameter name="tracks" type="TrackReference[] | TrackReferenceOrPlaceholder[]" optional=false %}
Track references to loop over. You can the use `useTracks()` hook to get TrackReferences.

{% /parameter %}
